column2: Do not force reindex on content files with compatible language levels

column3:
We switch between 2.6 and 2.7 frequently. Currently this forces a reindex of the
entire project (100k+ files). I believe this reindexing is not necessary for Python
Language levels which are AST compatible.
@sproshev I've made the suggested changes and rebased onto latest master. An EnumMap actually suffices because currently no level is compatible with more than one other.
Do not force reindex on content files with compatible language levels
